label: 南倉
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: The southern division within the Hōko (Treasure Repository) , the only remaining structure of the Shōsō-in at Tōdai-ji in Nara. Like the North Section, the South Section is built with the azekura (loghouse) construction method. [宝庫、正倉院、東大寺、校倉]
